title: Can a Admin please answer me with a legitimate answer.....
body:

Now let me know if you are dumb enough to play the game with that degenerate but I know I am not.... HOW can you penalize me with a 30 minute timer due to leaving a game lobby I know is 
a) not going to be a win
b) a waste of my fucking time and cause me to lose MORE lp that I already shouldnt have
c) nothing will be done to this person so they will continue being a %%%% in the future

now I have already wasted over an hour due to 3 individuals answer my question as to how this is fair on me? I back and wait 30minutes or play with the %%%% and lose anyway because they fell the need to be idiots because of who I feel like playing?

Why are Riot not intreoducing IP bans rather than account? would surely deter alot more people from trolling
